URL: 1983@http://diveintomark.org/
Date: 2002-12-01T15:39:49-05:00

Upon arriving safely in Raleigh, our stewardess sang us this, to the tune of 
Barney's I Love You, You Love Me: 

    We love you,
    You love us,
    We're much faster
    Than the bus. 

    We hope you've enjoyed our
    hos-pi-tal-i-ty,
    Marry one of us
    And you'll fly free.
